description.narrative: The initiative aims to serve as a ground to generate and test new ideas, to be further realized through a larger, EU-funded and UNDP implemented intervention – the SCBM Programme (tentative amount – 7,7 M EUR, 2019-2022).
seat of a first-order administrative division

sector.narrative: Eradicate poverty in all its forms and dimensions

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: Output 1. 1.1 An efficient institutionalized platform set up for influential groups to influence policy in Transnistria and Moldova proper. 1.2. Number of trend setters equipped with relevant tools to advance the confidence building agenda on both banks in various sectors 1.3. Number of top-level high-impact meetings organised to inspire creative joint solutions to be fed in development programming and policies on both banks 1.4. Number of programs aired on TV channels with wide coverage of both sides, to support cross river dialogue 1.5. Number of policy papers developed and provided as advocacy tools to key decision-makers in the settlement process Output 2 2.1. Number of insider mediators equipped with necessary tools and enabled to innovate and promote co-designed solutions benefitting the population on both banks of the Nistru river 2.2. Number of innovative solutions generated and implemented with the FW funds

comment.narrative: 1. Lack of cooperation among experts (2017) 2.Reduced capacity of existing BAs 3. 0 top-level high-impact meetings organised to inspire creative joint solutions to be fed in development programming and policies on both banks 4. Limited number of programs aired on TV channels with wide coverage of both sides, to support cross river dialogue 5. 0 policy papers developed and provided as advocacy tools to key decision-makers in the settlement process 6. No insider mediators equipped with necessary tools and enabled to innovate and promote co-designed solutions benefitting the population on both banks of the Nistru river 7. No innovative solutions generated and implemented

1. One efficient institutionalized platform set up for influential groups to influence policy in Transnistria and Moldova proper; 2. 30 (45% from either side, >50% women) trend setters equipped with relevant tools to advance the confidence building agenda on both banks in various sectors 3. Three top-level high-impact meetings organised to inspire creative joint solutions to be fed in development programming and policies on both banks 4. 13 programs aired on TV channels with wide coverage of both sides, to support cross river dialogue 5. Four policy paper developed and provided as advocacy tools to key decision-makers in the settlement process 6. 30 (45% from either side, >50% women) insider mediators equipped with necessary tools and enabled to innovate and promote co-designed solutions benefiting the population on both banks of the Nistru river; 7. Five innovative solutions generated and implemented with the FW funds.

Results achieved during the project implementation: 1. The platform was set up and its functional; 2. 30 (40% from left bank, 60% from right bank, 50% women) insider mediators equipped with relevant tools to advance the confidence building agenda on both banks in various sectors; 3. Three top-level high-impact meetings organized to inspire creative joint solutions to be fed in development programming and policies on both banks 4. 15 programs aired on TV channels with wide coverage of both sides, to support cross river dialogue 5. 1 policy papers developed and provided as advocacy tools to key decision-makers in the settlement process 6. 13 (53,8% from right bank, 46.2% from left bank, 53.8% women) insider mediators equipped with necessary tools and enabled to innovate and promote co-designed solutions benefiting the population on both banks of the Nistru river 7. Nine innovative solutions generated and implemented with the FW funds.
